name: aDirectory – Directory Listing WordPress Plugin
author: adirectory

sections.description:
A complete directory listing WordPress Plugin for creating professional Directories and classified websites. Specially made for Business Directory & Classified Listing Projects.
With Adirectory, it’s easier to build custom listings and classified websites, as it provides extended functions and controls.

All in One Directory Listing Plugin to Speed Up Your Projects

Discover our robust Adirectory Business Listing extension, meticulously fine-tuned to accommodate listings, offering a seamless management experience for your online directory WordPress websites. With Adirectory, effortlessly generate directory listings categorized by location, field, and various preferences, all without any coding requirement.

Create WordPress Websites Based on Different Categories with Adirectory

  • Business Directory WordPress Website
  • Real Estate Directory Listing WordPress Website
  • Car Listing WordPress Website
  • Classified Listing WordPress Website
  • Multipurpose Directory Listing
  • Multipurpose Classified Listing Websites

Adirectory WordPress Plugin Features

  • Fully customizable form fields (UNLIMITED CUSTOM FIELDS).
  • Location-wise search.
  • Listing grid and list view.
  • Listing details page.
  • Frontend dashboard.
  • Frontend “Add Listing” functionality added.
  • Demo data Importer and Exporter added
  • Rating and review system added.
  • Elementor addons integrated.
  • Listing image slider view
  • Listing reviews and ratings
  • Upload images per listing, allowing restricted numbers of images based on plan.
  • Widgets for Featured, Latest, and Random listings, and a search widget.
  • Unlimited categories.
  • Quick-search and sorting bar for listings for simple directory searches.
  • Advanced search screen with the ability to show/hide fields available for search.
  • Mobile-friendly, responsive support when installed with a responsive theme.
  • Multilingual directories.

Values that Adirectory Offers for Your Site

  • Clear and intuitive navigation
  • Optimized search functionality
  • Mobile responsiveness
  • SEO optimization
  • Regular updates and maintenance

Frontend Listing Submission and Management

Adirectory Business Directory & Classified Listings enables users to submit and manage their listings directly from the front end of the site, eliminating the need to access the admin panel.

Submit Listings: Easily add listings using the user-friendly frontend listing form.
User Dashboard: Access an intuitive dashboard for managing all your listings seamlessly.

Notes

For more details, support, and documentation, please visit adirectory.io.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
e.g.
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/adirectory directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
3. From Dashboard goto Adirectory -> Settings & Builders for configuration.
sections.faq:
Can I customize the form fields?

Yes, Adirectory allows you to fully customize form fields with unlimited custom fields.

Is Adirectory mobile-friendly?

Yes, Adirectory is designed to be mobile-friendly and responsive when installed with a responsive theme.
